keyMoments.title: Magellan's Debut
keyMoments.description: Chief Warden Magellan makes his first appearance as the strongest man in Impel Down, revealed as an enormous figure with bat wings and horn-like ornaments.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the primary antagonist of the Impel Down arc and establishes the major obstacle Luffy must overcome.

keyMoments.title: Doku Doku no Mi Revealed
keyMoments.description: Domino reveals that Magellan ate the Doku Doku no Mi, making him a Poison Human with absolute immunity to toxins and the ability to produce and control all types of poison.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Magellan as an extremely dangerous opponent whose poison abilities make him nearly unbeatable in direct combat.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Poison Breath
keyMoments.description: Magellan demonstrates his Devil Fruit power by breathing poisonous smoke at Hannyabal, showing how deadly and quick-acting his powers are.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Magellan's combat abilities in action.

abilities.description: Magellan exhales poisonous smoke that immediately affects those who breathe it in, requiring antidotes to counter.

relationships.description: Magellan is Hannyabal's superior as Chief Warden, though Hannyabal openly desires his position.

evolutionMoments.description: Magellan poisons Hannyabal for expressing his desire to become warden.

relationships.description: Magellan becomes infatuated with Hancock despite her attacking him.

evolutionMoments.description: Magellan falls for Hancock's beauty when she visits his office.

reveals.information: Ate the Doku Doku no Mi Devil Fruit, granting poison-based powers
Has severe digestive problems, spending 10 hours daily in bathroom and working only 4 hours per day
Chief Warden of Impel Down, the world's most secure underwater prison

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3 Reunites with Luffy in Impel Down
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3 (Galdino), formerly of Baroque Works, is discovered imprisoned in Level 2 of Impel Down. He reunites with Luffy, his former enemy from Little Garden.
keyMoments.significance: Reintroduces Mr. 3 to the story and sets up his crucial role in the Impel Down escape.
keyMoments.quote: Mr. 3! What are you doing here?!

statusHistory.reason: Captured and imprisoned in Impel Down Level 2

relationships.description: Former enemy from Little Garden who encountered each other again in Impel Down.

evolutionMoments.description: Mr. 3 reunites with Luffy in Impel Down Level 2.

relationships.description: Teams up with Buggy in Impel Down to escape, bonding over shared hatred of Luffy.

evolutionMoments.description: Mr. 3 and Buggy meet in Impel Down.

reveals.information: Imprisoned in Impel Down Level 2 after defeat by the Straw Hat Pirates

keyMoments.title: Hannyabal's Ambition Revealed
keyMoments.description: Hannyabal openly expresses his desire for Magellan to retire so he can become chief warden, showcasing his ambitious nature.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hannyabal's character motivation and provides insight into Impel Down's leadership dynamics.

keyMoments.title: Poisoned by Magellan
keyMoments.description: Hannyabal is poisoned by Magellan's breath for his insubordinate comments, requiring an immediate antidote.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the danger of Magellan's powers and the hazards of working under him.

relationships.description: Vice Warden serving under Chief Warden Magellan, though he desires Magellan's position.

evolutionMoments.description: Poisoned by Magellan for expressing ambition to become warden.

reveals.information: Ambitious and prone to Freudian slips revealing his desire to become Chief Warden

keyMoments.title: Domino Escorts Hancock to Level 4
keyMoments.description: Domino escorts Boa Hancock on an elevator to Level 4 and explains the dangers of the warden.
keyMoments.significance: Facilitates Hancock's infiltration mission and provides exposition about Magellan.
keyMoments.quote: The warden's office is on Level 4: Blazing Hell.

keyMoments.title: Explains Magellan's Schedule
keyMoments.description: Domino explains Magellan's unusual work schedule, including his digestive problems.
keyMoments.significance: Provides character background for Magellan and adds depth to the prison's operations.
keyMoments.quote: Warden Magellan has terrible digestive problems and usually stays in the bathroom for up to 10 hours a day.

keyMoments.title: Warns About Magellan's Poison Powers
keyMoments.description: Domino warns Hancock that Magellan ate the Doku Doku no Mi and is a poison man.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals crucial information about Magellan's Devil Fruit abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Magellan ate the Doku Doku no Mi, meaning he's a poison man, so be careful.

relationships.description: Serves as Hancock's guide through Impel Down during her visit.

evolutionMoments.description: Escorts Hancock to Magellan's office and provides warnings.
